TopicTitle: Inster a Cargo storage unit into the inventory of another Cargo storage unit

Articles.Content:
Hello everyone!  I wanted to know if it was possible to Inster a Cargo storage unit into the inventory of another Cargo storage unit...

I tried to add the two modules (ModuleCargoPart, ModuleInventoryPart) inside the file.cfg, but it does not work...

es.

MODULE
    {
        name = ModuleCargoPart
        packedVolume = 14
    }    

    MODULE
    {
        name = ModuleInventoryPart    
        InventorySlots = 3
        packedVolumeLimit = 180
    }
        

Thanks to everyone
